title: How to Change a Mono Track Into Stereo Track Using Audacity

steps.headline: Search and install the latest version of Audacity.
steps.description: Go to Google and search for Audacity.exe. Click on any link you find and install Audacity.

steps.headline: Go to open on the top left and search for the mono track you want to convert.
Go to tracks.
steps.description: Select add new and then click on stereo track.

steps.headline: Select the two tracks.
steps.description: Touch Ctrl and A at the same time.

steps.headline: Export it.
steps.description: Click file and then export your track and save it as .mp3.

text: Search and install the latest version of Audacity. Go to Google and search for Audacity.exe. Click on any link you find and install Audacity. Open Audacity.  Go to open on the top left and search for the mono track you want to convert.  Go to tracks. Select add new and then click on stereo track. Select the two tracks. Touch Ctrl and A at the same time. Go to tracks again. Click mix and render. Export it. Click file and then export your track and save it as .mp3.
sentences: Search and install the latest version of Audacity.
Go to Google and search for Audacity.exe.
Click on any link you find and install Audacity.
Go to open on the top left and search for the mono track you want to convert.
Select add new and then click on stereo track.
Touch Ctrl and A at the same time.
Click file and then export your track and save it as .mp3.
